name: champion
content:
champion noun [C]
(WINNER)
Add to word list
Add to word list
B1 (informal champ) someone or something, especially a person or animal, that has beaten all other competitors in a competition: an Olympic champion She is the world champion for the third year in succession. The defending champion will play his first match of the tournament tomorrow. Who are the reigning European football champions?
More examplesFewer examplesShe's the women's 1500 m champion .He looks set to become world champion again this year.The defending champion will play her first match of the tournament tomorrow.Who are the reigning European football champions?And our quiz champion tonight, with 46 points, is Jackie.
